Uses of Package
healpix.essentials

Packages that use healpix.essentials
healpix.core This package contains the Healpix core classes. 
healpix.core.dm This package contains the Healpix data model and implementation. 
healpix.essentials Package implementing essential HEALPix functionality. 
healpix.plot3d.gui.healpix3d This package contains the java3d classes to plot a healpix map on a 3D sphere to interact with. 
healpix.tools This package contains several tools for use within the HEALPix code. 
 

Classes in healpix.essentials used by healpix.core
HealpixBase
          Basic opersations related to the HEALPix pixelisation.
HealpixTables
          Various data tables needed by the HealpixBase class.
Pointing
          An angular position on the unit sphere.
Scheme
          The Healpix pixel ordering scheme.

Classes in healpix.essentials used by healpix.essentials

          Basic opersations related to the HEALPix pixelisation.

          Class representing a full HEALPix map containing double values.

          Class representing a full HEALPix map containing float values.

RangeSet
          Class for dealing with sets of integer ranges.

          Interface describing an iterator for going through all values in a RangeSet object.

          The Healpix pixel ordering scheme.
Vec3
          Cartesian 3-vector.
Zphi
          Class for storing a position on the unit sphere as a (z,phi)-tuple.
